title: I sculpted Graves in monsterclay!
body:
so like the title says i sculpted graves! i used the character design from the "[a new dawn](http://31.media.tumblr.com/606e67f2e294b95737ccbdeeeb69da5d/tumblr_n94u7eGKZe1qbdwkgo1_500.gif)" cinematic that was released last year. He stands about 12 cm tall.

[I also sculpted jax a while back](http://dicoi.deviantart.com/art/Jax-Monsterclay-sculpture-546774769)

if you want to find me on other sites i usually go by "Davethesculptor"
¨
Edit: i get it, cigar..

replies.body: Be careful, Rito doesn't want Graves to have a cigar

> [{quoted}](name=Vibrating Hotdog,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=Vo2IHpZI,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-19T01:09:19.324+0000)
>
> Be careful, Rito doesn't want Graves to have a cigar

beat me to it.
[That so?](http://cdn.leagueoflegends.com/apollo/content/lists-of-legends/6_RememberingZhonyas.gif)
That's really impressively done and it looks like your skills have improved even since your awesome Jax!  I'm particularly impressed by the cloth work for the scarf.  Good job.
Thank you! and the scarf only took three tries!
And the cigar was the best touch. 50 points to Griffendor!
I'm in slytherin.
I agree, the clothing is amazing and I couldn't even begin on how it was created so perfectly.
Tree. tries.
So can he have his cigar now?
I was expecting you to say something like 'You're hired!" Because this sculpture is pretty dope. But whatever.
This post will probably be removed for mature content, seeing as how he has a cigar. Looks great though! :D
im not worried ;)
Wow, Graves can have a cigar, but {{champion:104}} can't have a damn cigar.
hahahahaha, that was the best of those jokes I've ever seen. Hat's off to you sir.
You added the cigar! 10/10

> [{quoted}](name=Zorsus,realm=EUNE,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=Vo2IHpZI,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-07-19T08:43:12.139+0000)
>
> You added the cigar! 10/10

NO IT ISNT, ITS UMMM UMMM ITS A WEINER, YEAH GRAVES IS SUCKING A FAT ONE, SMOKING IS BAD KIDS, DON'T DO IT.
Its actually TF's severed finger

~~Write "Riot" on the cigar jk~~

This is really cool though, I love it!
you know what?, i'll write Rito on it
Awesome level in detail, I love good Graves art.  Well done :)
Thank you!
Really good job, hey you should post this to imgur, it might make the front page
Great idea! i just posted it [here!](http://imgur.com/gallery/HodtKsj/new)
incredible
Thank you!!
Really nice! I hope to see more
you will!

I keep forgetting to upload my Baron and Teemo sculptures.
       (>.<)
Do it!
Nice
that's a might fine mustache
He grew it himself!

Nice art, but it's not accurate at all

Graves doesn't smoke a cigar.
